title: goinmerry
author: goinmerry
created_time: June 06, 2023, 11:49:37 PMLast edit: June 10, 2023, 01:05:08 AM by goinmerry
content: UPDATE: I have to lock the thread in the meantime. The website is not working and no clear view of the rewards that are supposed to be escrowed by me as per the agreement prior to the Week 1 cut-off.WEBSITE | ANNOUNCEMENT THREAD | TWITTER | TELEGRAM |Whatsea is a play-to-earn brain game. Whatsea doesn't welcome you here if you see this or in any form imagine this concept as the new gambling of the internet.WhatSea is created and dedicated to those who are weak in decision makings and because of their phobia.Please check our website for more details. We are looking forward to a good run with the community.The bounty campaign will run for several months (long-term). Campaign Manager: goinmerryMaster Spreadsheet: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ejQCwCb7lHuQqje59OI4GTSqheZyB5u8QT8VZB_tx1c/edit?usp=sharingWeek 1 - June 7 - June 13 (ongoing)Week 2 - June 14 - June 20Week 3 - June 21 - June 27Week 4Week 5Week 6Week 7Week 8◘ Participants must follow the official TELEGRAM group. Please stay there until the end of the campaign. (MANDATORY)◘ Participants must join the TELEGRAM BOUNTY GROUP. All bounty-related concerns should only be posted here. (MANDATORY)◘ Bounty rewards will be sent directly to your ERC20 wallet address.◘ Forum accounts with negative trust from DTs are not allowed to join. If you received a valid negative trust while currently active in the campaign, no payment will be made and you will be removed.◘ Only 1 forum account per participant. If caught using multi-accounts while enrolled in the campaign, all stakes will be forfeited.◘  Strictly NO CHANGING OF AN ADDRESS. Don’t provide an address that is generated by Exchange. The address you will submit will be your address for the entire duration of the campaign. Please be responsible enough to secure your own address. ◘ If you joined 2 days before the weekly cut-off, your starting week will be on the following week (except for Week 1).◘ Having an authentication post is necessary for future reference.◘ Bump me a message if there's a need on modifying your inputs on the form.◘ We reserved the right to make changes on any terms if it’s reasonable to do so.◘ We reserved the right to remove a participant from the campaign for a valid reason.◘ We reserved the right to suspend or have the allocation reduced on a certain bounty if we found it underperforming.◘ We reserved the right to make adjustments to the rules if necessary*.◘ No KYC.◘ The weekly task will run from Wednesday to Tuesday (UTC 23:59:00). Please take note of the weekly cutoff. Allow us to process the payment within 2-3 days after the weekly cut-off.◘ For any questions regarding bounty, please head to the Telegram bounty group.5% of the total supply (5,550,000,000,000)Twitter - 30 %Youtube - 30 %Blog and Article - 30 %Telegram - 10 %The reward for Twitter Campaign will be paid weekly. Refer to the Twitter Bounty details for more information.TERMS:◘  Participants must FOLLOW the SEAGILS official TWITTER handle.◘  Open to all forum ranks◘  Minimum 1,000 Real Followers◘  Only 1 Twitter Account per Bitcointalk user.◘  Participants must do a total of 5x retweets per week and 3x self-tweets per week. Please spread it throughout the week. I will not count works that were done within just 3 days.◘. Tweets should have a hashtag of #seagils, mention @seagils, and link the website (https://seagils.xyz/).◘ It is allowed to do the same 3x self-tweets per week. For rt’s, please retweet new updates or just do the same if there are no new tweets.◘ I will ignore posts that have incomplete reports.HOW:Post this authentication post on the thread (MANDATORY). I will not count reports without having a separate post for authentication here first.Code:#Authentication PostBitcointalk Profile Link:Twitter Profile Link:ERC-20 address:After posting here, fill up this form: CLICK!Make a weekly report by posting in this format: (No need to report every day. Only once per week. NEW POST EVERY WEEK!)Code:Twitter Profile link:No. on the spreadsheet:Self-Tweet:1.2.3Retweets:1.2.3.4.5.REWARDS:1000 - 1999 Followers: 20,000 SEAG / Week2000 - 2999 Followers: 30,000 SEAG / Week3000 - 3999 Followers: 40,000 SEAG / Week4000+ Followers: 50,000 SEAG / WeekTERMS:◘ Create an awesome and unique video on what you think about SEAGILS◘ Open to all Forum Ranks◘ Minimum 500 Followers/Subscribers.◘ Videos should be at least 2 minutes short.◘ Videos should be in the English language only.◘ Include the site's official website (https://seagils.xyz/) and other social platform links (Twitter, Telegram) on the video description◘ It doesn’t matter if you want to add voice or just graphics. Play with your imagination. Make the content clear.◘ Wait for approval before making a video. We will check each of the accounts first and allow us up to 24 - 48 to approve your status. Check the spreadsheet if you are accepted.◘ Up to 10 submitted videos per userHOW:Post this authentication post on the thread (MANDATORY). I will not count reports without having a separate post for authentication here first.Code:#Authentication PostBitcointalk Profile link:Youtube Channel:ERC-20 Address:After posting here, fill up this form: CLICK!If accepted, submit your work in this format:Code:Bitcointalk Profile link:Youtube Channel:Link to your work:ERC-20 Address:REWARDS:500 - 1000 followers = 2 stakes1001 - 2000 followers =  4 stakes2001 - 2999 = 6 stakes3000 - 3999 = 8 stakes4000 + = 10 stakesAdditional stakes: (we will check it at the end of the bounty program)Watched 1000 - 2999 times = 2 stakesWatched 3000 - 4999 times = 4 stakesWatched 5000+  times = 6 stakesQuality Fair = 1 stakeQuality Good = 2 stakesQuality Best = 3 stakesTERMS:◘ Create an awesome, informative, and good article or blog review about SEAGILS.◘ Open to all Forum Ranks◘ Minimum 500 followers or subscribers. If that’s a website, we will check it first.◘ Articles should be made to the original concept. We will only accept ENGLISH reviews.◘ As much as possible, include your own thoughts about the project alongside the basic information you will see at your preferred source.◘ Any ranks are welcome to apply. We will be based on your blog page.◘ Wait for approval before making an article. We will check each of the user’s pages first and allow us up to 24 - 48 to approve your status. Check the spreadsheet if you are approved.◘ Not accepting .blogspot domain or hosted by Blogger.HOW:Post this authentication post on the thread (MANDATORY). I will not count reports without having a separate post for authentication here first.Code:#Authentication PostBitcointalk Profile link:Article, Blog, Website:ERC-20 Address:After posting here, fill up this form: CLICK!If accepted, submit your work in this format:Code:Bitcointalk Profile link:Blog Page/Profile:Link to your work:ERC-20 Address:REWARDS:500-999 Followers: 2 Stake1000-2999 Followers: 4 Stakes3000 + Followers: 6 stakesAdditional stakes: (we will check it at the end of the bounty program)Quality Fair = 2 stakeQuality Good = 4 stakesQuality Best = 6 stakesTERMS:◘ Participants must follow the TELEGRAM group. Please stay there until the end of the campaign. (MANDATORY)◘ If we don’t see your account at the end of the bounty program and you joined one of the bounties, no reward will be made.◘ Join the discussion there and be involved with the SEAGILS CommunityHOW:Post in this thread with the ff:Code:#Authentication PostBitcointalk Profile link:Telegram handle @:ERC-20 address:After posting here, fill up this form: CLICK!REWARDS:1 STAKE each
